item.analyzer.name: Soil Analyzer
item.analyzer.description: A high-tech device to measure NPK levels in the soil. Hold it to visualize soil health.
item.shelter.name: Ladybug Shelter
item.shelter.description: A small house for beneficial insects. Protects nearby crops (6 tile radius) from pest invasions.
mail.robin_shelter.title: Old Blueprints found!
mail.robin_shelter.body: Hey @,^I was dusting off some old shelves in the shop and found these blueprints for a 'Ladybug Shelter'.^My grandfather used to make them to keep pests away without chemicals. I think it would be perfect for your ecosystem project!^Stop by the shop if you want the recipe.^^   - Robin
